title: Storage Growth
description: Weekly storage size and file count per bucket from the most recent scan (gold_storage_growth_weekly).

panels.title: Storage Size by Bucket (bytes)
panels.description: Latest observed total storage size for each bucket per week.  Week-over-week growth highlights fast-growing areas.

targets.rawSql: SELECT week_start::TIMESTAMP AS time, bucket AS metric, latest_size_bytes AS value FROM gold_storage_growth_weekly ORDER BY week_start, bucket

panels.title: File Count by Bucket
panels.description: Latest observed file count in each storage bucket per week.  A sudden jump flags runaway temp-file accumulation.

targets.rawSql: SELECT week_start::TIMESTAMP AS time, bucket AS metric, latest_file_count AS value FROM gold_storage_growth_weekly ORDER BY week_start, bucket
